title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a pan, cook pancetta until crisp.
Beat eggs and mix with cheese and pepper.
Drain spaghetti and combine with pancetta and egg mixture.
